name: swcourt
story: Super World Court is a tennis game and sequel to World Court. There are sixteen players to choose from: seven male, six female, as well as one robot, cat and frog. The game includes four tournaments - American Open (hard court), French Open (clay), British Open (grass) and Namco Open which features a cameo appearance by Namco's mascot Pac-Man. Singles and doubles matches (supporting up to 4 players simultaneously) are available.
